author: acmurthy
msg: HADOOP-1965. Interleave sort/spill in teh map-task along with calls to the Mapper.map method. This is done by splitting the 'io.sort.mb' buffer into two and using one half for collecting map-outputs and the other half for sort/spill. Contributed by Amar Kamat.

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Jeremy Wickersheimer "Process order payment doesn't check for cancelled/rejected order" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-1573) - OFBIZ-1573
Not sure how to test this but it's really simple to review and obviously it makes sense.
